title: Suits by individuals
context: [ยง445-95.6] Suits by individuals. Any person injured by a violation of section 445-95.2 has a private right of action and may bring a civil action to recover three times the person&rsquo;s actual damages or $1,000 for each violation, whichever sum is greater. Any person bringing such an action shall also be entitled to recover the person&rsquo;s costs together with reasonable attorneys&rsquo; fees. [L 1988, c 313, pt of ยง3]
